titleStmt.title: Christ's kirk on the green composed (as is supposed) by King James the Fifth.
titleStmt.author: James I, King of Scotland, 1394-1437.
James V, King of Scotland, 1512-1542.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston by command,

notesStmt.note: "The attribution to James V of Scotland is almost certainly false; evidence for and against the authorship of James I of Scotland, now generally accepted, is summarized in David Irving's The history of Scotish poetry, 1681, p. 142-148."--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
The copy listed J413 on reel 1464 has been determined to be a post-1700 edition.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
